name: DOG WANTS TREAT
description:
Guide the Corgi with a treat through a series of obstacle runs!

[This game has a NG+ with a complete new challenge with 3  achievements , so try it out once you beat normal mode :D]

_How to play:

Use your MOUSE to move the treat around and press LEFT CLICK to make the dog leap a short distance. Avoid frogs and water at all costs!

You can pause the game by pressing SPACEBAR

This game was made for the Boundless Game Jam. ONE BUTTON limitation.

Programming and Art: @ricenoodles
SFX & Music: @adoankim

Dog barks: Mus & Lucas <3
Special guests: Masayoshi Soken, Nova Era.

Software:
-Construct 3, Aseprite, Ableton Live
